tldr: This obituary notice highlights the life and achievements of Jan Christiaan Smuts, a versatile figure in law, administration, military, and politics. Smuts is also known for his philosophy of Holism, which he developed over his lifetime. The article discusses how his philosophy influenced his actions and decisions, both in his personal life and in his role as a statesman.
